data.subject_line: Welcome to your digital future
data.message_body: Hello {name}! Your phone is now verified with Uniti. You're about to discover apps that can help you save money access healthcare improve your education and grow your business - all from your phone. Your journey to digital independence starts now.

data.subject_line: 10 GHC earned - your digital toolkit is ready
data.message_body: Excellent {name}! You've downloaded all your priority apps and earned 10 GHC. Your digital toolkit is now complete: {downloaded_apps}. Next step: Register in these apps to start achieving your goals. The first app you register in will earn you 15 GHC + 250MB data!

data.subject_line: Your setup is complete - here's how to earn more
data.message_body: {name} you're officially ready to go digital! You've earned 30 GHC just for getting started. Now the real rewards begin: 15 GHC for first app registration 20 GHC for first core activity Weekly data rewards for active usage Your journey to digital independence has begun!

data.subject_line: 5 GHC + 350MB earned for P2G completion
data.message_body: Thank you {name}! You've completed your first Progress-to-Goal survey and earned 5 GHC + 350MB data. Your feedback helps us serve you better. Based on your responses here are personalized recommendations: {p2g_recommendations}. Next P2G survey in 4 weeks - another opportunity to earn!

data.subject_line: 500MB earned for sharing your story
data.message_body: Thank you {name}! You've earned 500MB data for sharing your testimonial. Your story will help others in your community discover how digital services can improve their lives. Stories like yours are the reason Uniti exists - to help everyone access the digital economy. Keep up the great work!

data.subject_line: Having trouble with your apps? Here's personalized help
data.message_body: Hi {name} we noticed you haven't been using your apps much. That's okay - digital services can take time to learn! Common issues we can help with: App not working properly? Forgot passwords? Need help with features? Reply to this message or contact our support team. We're here to help you succeed!

data.subject_line: Your money deserves better than hiding under the mattress
data.message_body: Hello {name}! Money hidden at home loses value every year due to inflation. Thieves can steal it. Fire can destroy it. With People's Pension Trust your savings are protected and grow over time. Even starting with just 2 cedis per day can build real wealth for your future. Your downloaded PPT app is ready - let's secure your financial future today!

data.subject_line: Simple steps to open your pension account
data.message_body: {name} opening your PPT account takes just 3 minutes: 1) Open the PPT app 2) Take a photo of your Ghana Card 3) Set your monthly savings amount (start with just 10 cedis) 4) Choose your payment method. That's it! Your future self will thank you. Need help? Reply 'HELP' and we'll walk you through it step by step.

data.subject_line: 20 GHC + 350MB earned for taking control of your future
data.message_body: Outstanding {name}! You've opened your PPT pension account and earned 20 GHC cash + 350MB data. This is more than a reward - it's your first step toward financial independence. Your future self will thank you for this smart decision. Now make your first deposit to start building wealth!

data.subject_line: Double your impact with your first deposit
data.message_body: {name} your PPT account is ready! Make your first deposit within 48 hours and we'll add a 5 GHC bonus to your savings. Whether it's 5 cedis or 50 cedis every amount counts when it starts growing. Don't wait - compound interest works best when you start early!

data.subject_line: First deposit complete! 25 GHC + 500MB earned
data.message_body: Excellent {name}! You've made your first PPT deposit and earned 25 GHC cash + 500MB data. You're now officially building wealth for your future! Your money is safe protected and growing. Smart savers like you understand that every cedi saved today becomes multiple cedis tomorrow.

data.subject_line: You're officially building wealth!
data.message_body: Congratulations {name}! Your first PPT deposit makes you a wealth builder. Most people just talk about saving - you're actually doing it! data.subject_line: Why small regular deposits beat large one-time savings
data.message_body: {name} here's something important about wealth building: Someone saving 20 cedis monthly for 20 years will have over 30000 cedis (with compound interest) while someone making one 240 cedi deposit gets just that. Small regular savings beat large one-time deposits. Make your second deposit this week!

data.message_body: Great job {name}! You've made multiple deposits - that's how wealth is built. You're developing the saving habit that separates financial winners from everyone else. data.subject_line: Why wait in clinic lines when doctors come to your phone?
data.message_body: Hello {name}! Going to clinic means: losing work time transport costs long queues exposure to other sick people. With Ghinger Health: consult doctors from home no transport needed immediate attention safe and private. A 15-minute phone consultation can solve what used to take half a day at clinic. Your health deserves this convenience!

data.subject_line: Register for instant access to doctors
data.message_body: {name} getting doctor access on Ghinger Health is simple: 1) Open Ghinger Health app 2) Enter your phone number 3) Add basic health info (age allergies) 4) Upload Ghana Card photo 5) Verify with SMS code. Takes 3 minutes! Once registered you can consult doctors 24/7 for common health issues. Your family's health shouldn't wait!

data.subject_line: Reading opens doors to knowledge and opportunities
data.message_body: Hello {name}! Strong readers have advantages in every area of life: Better job applications and interviews Easier learning of new skills Access to information that creates opportunities Understanding of contracts and important documents Confidence in any educational setting. With reading apps you can improve reading speed comprehension and vocabulary. Reading is the foundation of all learning!

data.subject_line: Simple steps to improve your reading skills
data.message_body: {name} improving your reading with apps is straightforward: 1) Open reading app and take skill assessment 2) Start with your current level (no shame in starting anywhere) 3) Practice 15-20 minutes daily 4) Complete exercises for comprehension and speed 5) Track your progress as skills improve Better reading means better opportunities in everything you do!
